title: Youkai Gakkou no Sensei Hajimemashita!
original_name: 妖怪学校の先生はじめました！
sinopse: A crybaby and timid novice teacher, Abe Haruaki has been appointed to teach—as much to his surprise—in a school full of youkai?! A story which portrays the weird and wonderful daily lives of a coward human teacher and his youkai students.
